dcterms:description: The SOLD dataset consists of 10,000 manually annotated tweets divided into two classes: Offensive and Not offensive, both at the token level and the sentence level. The dataset provided for the task contains 7500 samples in the train set, each labeled as HOF or NOT. The test set contains 2500 samples.
dcterms:title: SOLD: Sinhala Offensive Language Detection dataset

dcterms:creator: K. G. Aditya Shankar Pal
dcterms:description: The Annihilate hates (Bodo) dataset is part of a Kaggle competition aimed at hate speech detection in the Bodo language.
dcterms:title: Annihilate hates (Bodo)

dcterms:creator: K. Ghosh
dcterms:description: The Annihilate hates (Bengali) dataset is part of a Kaggle competition focused on hate speech detection in the Bengali language.
dcterms:title: Annihilate hates (Bengali)

dcterms:creator: K. G. Aditya Shankar Pal
dcterms:description: The Annihilate hates (Assamese) dataset is part of a Kaggle competition aimed at hate speech detection in the Assamese language.
dcterms:title: Annihilate hates (Assamese)

dcterms:creator: K. Ghosh
A. Senapati
A. S. Pal
dcterms:description: The Annihilate Hates (Task 4, HASOC 2023) dataset focuses on hate speech detection in Assamese, Bengali, and Bodo languages as part of the HASOC 2023 shared tasks.
dcterms:title: Annihilate Hates (Task 4, HASOC 2023)

dcterms:description: The Overview of the HASOC subtrack at FIRE 2023 dataset includes hate-speech identification tasks in Sinhala and Gujarati.
dcterms:title: Overview of the HASOC subtrack at FIRE 2023 (Gujarati and Sinhala)
